title: What You Do to Me
description: Abby Porter's husband dies unexpectedly and she is left with the daily struggle of raising three girls on her own. Her friends, Derek and Lexi, decide to help her rediscover the self she lost during her marriage by composing a list of all the things she wanted to, but could never do.While completing one of tasks on the list, Abby finds herself at an Awakening concert, where fate plays a hand in bringing her together with the lead singer, Alex Morgan.Will her extreme attraction to Alex hep her open the door to a second chance, or will she allow the protective instinct for her heart and her daughters push him away?
author: Izzy Cullen
